addInvoice(address,string,string,uint256.author: Denis M. Putnam
addInvoice(address,string,string,uint256.details: Add's an invoice to be tracked.

params._dates: array of dates for timesheetEndDate, invoiceSentDate, due30DaysDate, due60DaysDate, due90DaysDate, due120DaysDate
params._numberHours: number of hours for the timesheet.

params._address: wallet account address for the user

returns.count: of invoices associated with the given client

getInvoiceNumbers(address,string,string).author: Denis M. Putnam
getInvoiceNumbers(address,string,string).details: returned string is a comma separated string of invoice numbers.  The comma is also the end of the string if no other values appear.

returns._0: a comma seperated list of invoice numbers associated with the client.
